transformationRules.description: Fix capitalization of sentences and proper nouns while preserving intentional ALL CAPS
Expand common abbreviations (e.g., 'idk' to 'I don't know', 'abr' to 'abbreviation')
Remove excessive whitespace and newlines while preserving paragraph breaks
Preserve @mentions, hashtags, and URLs exactly as written
Correct obvious punctuation errors, including proper comma usage
Remove extra line breaks before and after @mentions
Convert informal numbered lists into proper HTML ordered lists
